metadata.title: CVE-2022-41848 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - negligible
metadata.description: drivers/char/pcmcia/synclink_cs.c in the Linux kernel through 5.19.12 has arace condition and resultant use-after-free if a physically proximateattacker removes a PCMCIA device while calling ioctl, aka a race conditionbetween mgslpc_ioctl and mgslpc_detach.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and may need fixing.

linux-realtime package in realtime/noble is affected and may need fixing.
